column2: Latitude of the monitoring plot in decimal degrees (WGS84).
Longitude of the monitoring plot in decimal degrees (WGS84).
Unique plot identifier per each fixed plot location (lat/long pairing) (e.g., plot001).
Calendar year of the Great Huki restoration event associated with the plot (if applicable).
Calendar date of assessment survey in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Integer years since the huki event or assessment date.
Mean sand depth measured during assessment (in cm).
Species or substrate code, representing macroalgal species or substrate type (e.g., 'avrainvillea_lacerata').
Point-intercept count (hits) of alga taxa or substrate. Each plot: 25 quadrat points x 4 replicate s= 100 possible hits.
Percent cover (%) (count / total_points) × 100. Values may exceed 100 across categories because multiple species can occur under a single point.
Morphological/functional group. Values: 'Green Algae', 'Red Algae', 'Brown Algae', 'Cyanobacteria', 'Substrate', 'Other'.
Restoration priority ecological grouping (community type). Values: 'Native', 'Invasive', 'NA' for 'Other'/substrate.
Readable species names with spaces and capitalization (e.g., "Avrainvillea lacerata").
